ygData.subject: ABOUT A TOUNAMENT
ygData.msgSnippet: I m writing because i found out something about a tournament on the Povar server.  For those that read EQ vault you know about this.  I say all wizards boycott
ygData.messageBody:
I'm writing because i found out something about a tournament on the Povar
server. For those that read EQ vault you know about this. I say all wizards
boycott this tournament because the root spell is not allowed in it. It is
obviously run by a melee type character. I'm not on this server but i would
hate to see a wizard get slaughtered because they can't root. So if you want
send this message to everyone on povar server!!

Parthon lvl 12
